title: Ontology tools for computational genomic data science
text: package enables users explore visualize relationships among concepts enumerated biomedical ontologies.

title: Ontology tools for computational genomic data science
text: ontoProc uses AnnotationHub manage ontology representations. can retrieve recent version UBERON ontology follows:
code: library(AnnotationHub) ah = AnnotationHub() query(ah, "ontoProc") ## AnnotationHub with 41 records ## # snapshotDate(): 2024-10-28 ## # $dataprovider: NA ## # $species: NA ## # $rdataclass: Rda ## # additional mcols(): taxonomyid, genome, description, ## #   coordinate_1_based, maintainer, rdatadateadded, preparerclass, tags, ## #   rdatapath, sourceurl, sourcetype  ## # retrieve records with, e.g., 'object[["AH97934"]]'  ##  ##              title               ##   AH97934  | caro                ##   AH97935  | cellLineOnto        ##   AH97936  | cellOnto            ##   AH97937  | cellosaurusOnto     ##   AH97938  | chebi_full          ##   ...        ...                 ##   AH111561 | hcaoOnto_2022.12.16 ##   AH111562 | mondo_2022.12.01    ##   AH111563 | patoOnto_2023.02.17 ##   AH111564 | PROnto_68           ##   AH111565 | uberon_2023.02.14 library(ontoProc) ub = getOnto("uberon") head(names(ub)) ## [1] "id"        "name"      "parents"   "children"  "ancestors" "obsolete" ub$name[1:10] ##                         BFO:0000001                         BFO:0000002  ##                            "entity"                        "continuant"  ##                         BFO:0000003                         BFO:0000004  ##                         "occurrent"            "independent continuant"  ##                         BFO:0000006                         BFO:0000015  ##                    "spatial region"                           "process"  ##                         BFO:0000016                         BFO:0000017  ##                       "disposition"                 "realizable entity"  ##                         BFO:0000019                         BFO:0000020  ##                           "quality" "specifically dependent continuant"

title: Ontology tools for computational genomic data science
text: take advantage Daniel Greene’s ontologyIndex suite packages produce visualizations concept relationships.

title: Ontology tools for computational genomic data science
text: ctmarks function defines shiny app addresses cell-type-defining marker genes. Users select cell type, position Cell Ontology network rendered.  Using available inter-ontology relationships, protein transcriptional annotations cell type tabulated.

title: Ontology tools for computational genomic data science
text: pogos package confronts relationships ontologies cells cell lines compounds used pharmacology pharmacogenomics. Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia (CCLE) includes datasets describing sensitivity cell lines drugs. pogos provides tools querying PharmacoDB system rendering sensitivity results CCLE.
code: library(pogos) iri = iriCCLE() iri ## DRTraceSet for 5 cell lines, drug Irinotecan, dataset CCLE plot(iri)

title: Ontology tools for computational genomic data science
text: Bioconductor includes rols package interrogates EBI Ontology Lookup Service.
